channel.title: :d
channel.description:
You have to put quotes around the words you put in the blank. :)
[center]First Day of School[/center]
[left]My first day at school was _______. I wore my new _______ and _______ sneakers with my lime green ________. My brother said I looked like a rainbow, but I know I looked good. On the bus, I sat next to a kid named _______. My teachers seem cool, But one of them has a moustache that looks like a _________. Even the food in the cafeteria was good. Last year everything tasted like _________. I know this is going to be a great year! Even if i do have _________ pages of homework each night![/left]

item.title: :d
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

[quote=“Heroic, post:1, topic:83700”]You have to put quotes around the words you put in the blank.

[center]First Day of School[/center]

[left]My first day at school was 5|-|1t. I wore my new binbag and puma sneakers with my lime green socks.
My brother said I looked like a rainbow, but I know I looked good. On the bus, I sat next to a kid named philbert. My teachers seem cool, But one of them has a moustache that looks like a nazi. Even the food in the cafeteria was good. Last year everything tasted like cat. I know this is going to be a great year! Even if i do have to make my dog eat thirteen pages of homework each night![/left][/quote]

@apzrman wrote:

First Day of School

My first day at school was “terrorrific”. I wore my new “greasy singlet found in the bin” and “hobo” sneakers with my lime green “ruck sack”.
My brother said I looked like a bum, but I know I looked good. On the bus, I sat next to a kid named “gahrgatronicanimationmonkeyfoetus”. My teachers seem cool, But one of them has a moustache that looks like “Hitler’s moustache”. Even the food in the cafeteria was good. Last year everything tasted like cardboard. I know this is going to be a great year! Even if i do have “no home and 69” pages of homework each night!
